# my-progress-ring



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                       | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Default                                                                                                                               |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `colors`          | `colors`           | Color steps of the ring           | `Map<number, string> \| string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `new Map([     [0, "#ff4f40"], // red     [25, "#ffcd40"], // yellow     [50, "#66a0ff"], // blue     [75, "#30bf7a"], // green   ])` |
| `decimalSize`     | `decimal-size`     | Font size of the decimal places   | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `undefined`                                                                                                                           |
| `disableDecimals` | `disable-decimals` | Hide decimal places               | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`                                                                                                                               |
| `disableDigits`   | `disable-digits`   | Hide digits                       | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`                                                                                                                               |
| `duration`        | `duration`         | Animation duration in miliseconds | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `4000`                                                                                                                                |
| `easingType`      | `easing-type`      | Easing animation function name    | `"backInOut" \| "backIn" \| "backOut" \| "bounceInOut" \| "bounceIn" \| "bounceOut" \| "circInOut" \| "circIn" \| "circOut" \| "cubicInOut" \| "cubicIn" \| "cubicOut" \| "elasticInOut" \| "elasticIn" \| "elasticOut" \| "expoInOut" \| "expoIn" \| "expoOut" \| "linear" \| "quadInOut" \| "quadIn" \| "quadOut" \| "quartInOut" \| "quartIn" \| "quartOut" \| "quintInOut" \| "quintIn" \| "quintOut" \| "sineInOut" \| "sineIn" \| "sineOut"` | `"quartInOut"`                                                                                                                        |
| `eventId`         | `event-id`         | Unique ID for the event listeners | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `undefined`                                                                                                                           |
| `intSize`         | `int-size`         | Font size of the integer          | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `30`                                                                                                                                  |
| `invertColors`    | `invert-colors`    | Inverts the color scheme          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`                                                                                                                               |
| `percentage`      | `percentage`       | Percentage value (mandatory)      | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `0`                                                                                                                                   |
| `radius`          | `radius`           | Radius of the ring                | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `80`                                                                                                                                  |
| `roundLinecap`    | `round-linecap`    | Addes rounded linecap to the ring | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`                                                                                                                               |
| `strokeWidth`     | `stroke-width`     | Thickness of the ring             | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `10`                                                                                                                                  |


## Events

| Event         | Description                                          | Type                                   |
| ------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `prcColor`    | Color value to be emitted                            | `CustomEvent<ColorChangeEventPayload>` |
| `prcComplete` | OnComplete event of the animation                    | `CustomEvent<EventPayload>`            |
| `prcProgress` | Animation progress value to be emitted (from 0 to 1) | `CustomEvent<ProgressEventPayload>`    |
| `prcRestart`  | OnRestart event of the animation                     | `CustomEvent<EventPayload>`            |
| `prcResume`   | OnResume event of the animation                      | `CustomEvent<EventPayload>`            |
| `prcStart`    | OnStart event of the animation                       | `CustomEvent<EventPayload>`            |
| `prcStop`     | OnStop event of the animation                        | `CustomEvent<EventPayload>`            |
